name: Wild Souls (itch)
description:
Beware!

This game include some NSFW images!!!

"Wild Souls" is a Bara LGBTQ+ Idle Tamagotchi game that you need make the guys fall in love for you and unlock new images for them.

You'll need to farm food and water and give to them to get Ores. Ores is EXP system in-game.

Every crushGuy got 5 levels that you evolve them touching them (caring) or on Care screen giving to them groceries.

Cattys is the money system, cattys can be used to buy food, water, diamonds and future items.

Diamonds are used to buy more crushGuys released as the project grows.

The game is very early acess with 1 character completed and half of systems on beta.

Please, follow me and support me on twitter: @ Zettacatty , Patreon and here on Itch.io.

Hope you guys like it!
